Name: Theater production venue relationship
Description: A mediator recording a venue where a particular theater production took place, and the start date and end date of its occupancy.

Properties.Name: End date
Properties.Description: The end date of the production's occupancy of this venue. This may not be the same as /theater/theater_production/date_closed if the production occupied more than one venue during its run.

Properties.Name: Start date
Properties.Description: The start date of the production's occupancy of this venue. This may not be the same as /theater/theater_production/date_opened if the production occupied more than one venue during its run.

Properties.Name: Theater
Properties.Description: The location at which the theater production was performed between the given start and end dates.

Properties.Name: Theater production
Properties.Description: The theater production which took place at this venue between the given start and end dates.
